info.title: Contact information
info.description: Prefer direct contact? Here are all the ways to find me.
info.emailDescription: I respond in less than 24 hours

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about my work process

items.q: How long does it take to develop a project?
items.a: It depends on the project's complexity. A simple website can take 2-4 weeks, while a complex application can take 2-6 months. I'll give you a detailed timeline after evaluating your project.

items.q: Do you work with international clients?
items.a: I work with clients from all over the world, but my primary communication is in Spanish. If your team speaks Spanish, I'll be happy to collaborate and coordinate schedules across different time zones.
Yes, I offer different maintenance plans that include security updates, performance optimizations, and new features according to your needs.

items.q: What is your preferred tech stack?
items.a: I mainly work with React/Next.js for frontend, Node.js/NestJS or PHP/Laravel for backend, and PostgreSQL or MySQL for databases. However, I adapt to the specific needs of each project.

ctaSection.title: Ready to <gradient>start?</gradient>
ctaSection.subtitle: It doesn't matter if your idea is in the conceptual stage or you already have detailed specifications. We can work together to make it a reality.

about.title: Building the <gradient>digital future</gradient>
about.subtitle: I'm a full stack developer passionate about creating digital experiences that make a difference. With over 4 years of experience, I combine creativity and technology to solve complex problems.

skills.title: Technologies and tools
skills.subtitle: My current tech stack, organized by categories

React.description: JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces with reusable components and efficient state management.

Next.js.description: React framework for building fast web applications with hybrid rendering (SSR/SSG), optimized routes and excellent performance.

Astro.description: Modern framework for ultra-fast websites with islands architecture and optimized static content.

TypeScript.description: JavaScript superset with static typing that allows writing safer, more robust and maintainable code.

Tailwind CSS.description: Utility-first CSS framework for creating modern and responsive designs quickly without leaving HTML.

Node.js.description: Server-side JavaScript runtime environment for building fast and scalable backend applications.

Express.description: Minimalist and flexible framework for Node.js, ideal for creating RESTful APIs and web applications quickly.

NestJS.description: Framework for Node.js with modular architecture and native TypeScript support, ideal for scalable and maintainable APIs.

PHP.description: Server-side programming language, widely used for dynamic web development and enterprise applications.

Laravel.description: Modern and elegant PHP framework with expressive syntax, ideal for developing robust and scalable web applications.

PostgreSQL.description: Advanced open-source relational database system with powerful performance and reliability features.

MySQL.description: Open-source relational database management system, widely used for high-traffic web applications.

MongoDB.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database, flexible and scalable, ideal for modern applications with unstructured data.

SQLite.description: Lightweight embedded relational database, ideal for mobile and desktop applications without needing a dedicated server.

Docker.description: Container platform that allows packaging applications with all their dependencies for consistent deployment.

Google Cloud.description: Cloud services platform with scalable infrastructure, storage and enterprise computing solutions.

Git.description: Distributed version control system for tracking code changes and facilitating team collaboration.

experience.title: My professional journey
experience.subtitle: A journey through my evolution as a developer and the projects that have marked my career

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Development of web and mobile applications, creation of APIs with Laravel, integration with external services and construction of modern and responsive interfaces.
achievements: Design and development of administrative dashboards for internal management
Creation and maintenance of REST APIs with Laravel for production products
Implementation of complete authentication, registration and user management flows
Visual and performance optimization using Tailwind CSS and UI/UX best practices
Participation in technical documentation of modules and components

items.title: Full Stack Developer – Freelancer
items.description: I developed a complete web platform for customer, service and technical support management, integrating a robust backend with a modern and easy-to-use interface.
achievements: Creation of a secure authentication system with roles and permissions
Design of administrative dashboard for activity tracking
Implementation of complete CRUDs for users, services and support tickets
Production deployment with database integration and activity logs

items.degree: Self-Taught Higher Education in Web Development
items.description: I have developed advanced skills in web and mobile development in a self-taught manner, covering both Frontend and Backend, with a practical focus on real projects.
I have deepened my knowledge through courses and practical projects, working with modern frameworks and libraries, development best practices and agile methodologies.
